description:
1. N.S. shooting inquiry: Bureaucracy and muddled advice in RCMP's search for helicopter  CTV News Atlantic
  2. Opinion: The Nova Scotia inquiry is prioritizing the trauma of police over the trauma of victims' families  The Globe and Mail
title: N.S. shooting inquiry: Bureaucracy and muddled advice in RCMP's search for helicopter - CTV News Atlantic
content:
HALIFAX - 
The inquiry investigating the Nova Scotia mass shooting has released new details about the Mounties' scramble to find an aircraft to track down the killer on the night of April 18, 2020.… [+4875 chars]

author: Alexandre Silberman
description: The Canadian National Railway is spending $40 million towards maintaining its infrastructure in New Brunswick, replacing the least amount of track and railroad ties in the province in five years.
title: CN invests $40M into New Brunswick line, replacing just 2 miles of rail
content:
